Npc0083:
ï¿½I'm really in a foul mood.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Why?[PAUSE 20]  Because the Mayor doesn't like me.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I think I'll just kick back for a while.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It just may take me a couple of hours to sign this paper. *snicker* *snort*[HALT][END]
